metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36386 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.1. net/bluetooth/hci_event.c has a slab out-of-bounds read in hci_extended_inquiry_result_evt, aka CID-51c19bf3d5cf.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-36386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.11.0-16.17
linux-image-5.13.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.11.0-16.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic - 5.11.0-16.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-generic-64k - 5.11.0-16.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-37-lowlatency - 5.11.0-16.17
No subscription required

No subscription required
